EmailTemplate.name: West Coast CTO Roadshow 12_9 Q4 2015.Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Registered: VMTurbo CTO Roadshow Dinner - San Francisco
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering to attend The VMTurbo CTO Roadshow San Francisco! Your details, as well as venue details, are below:
{{Lead.First Name:default=}} {{Lead.Last Name:default=}} {{company.Company Name:default=}} VMTurbo CTO Roadshow San Francisco Four Seasons <http://www.fourseasons.com/sanfrancisco/> â€“ Windows Room 757 Market St, San Francisco, CA 94103 7:00 PM
We cannot wait to see you at this exciting event featuring VMTurbo Chief Technology Officer, Charles Crouchman (formally of Cirba and Opalis Software). If you have any questions, please contact marketing@vmturbo.com <mailto:marketing@vmturbo.com>. Best, Team Turbo
